snippet: Starting in 2013 the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America will convene in the summers and consist of musicians aged 16 to 19.
abstract: Carnegie Hall announces establishment of the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America which will consist of musicians from ages 16 to 19 and convene for three weeks every summer starting in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Starting in 2013 the National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America will convene in the summers and consist of musicians aged 16 to 19.

headline.seo: Carnegie Hall to Establish National Youth Orchestra in 2013
headline.main: Carnegie Hall to Establish National Youth Orchestra
headline.print_headline: Carnegie Hall to Establish National Youth Orchestra
